customProperties.armorEffects: Once per short rest, when you make an ability check or saving throw you can add +2 to it (after the roll but before you know the results).
customProperties.weaponEffects: Once per short rest, when you make an attack roll with this weapon you can add +2 to its to hit (and if that attack hits) the damage roll as well. You must do this after you roll, but before you know the result.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: Once per short rest, when you make an ability check or saving throw you can add +2 to it (after the roll but before you know the results).

Weapon Effects: Once per short rest, when you make an attack roll with this weapon you can add +2 to its to hit (and if that attack hits) the damage roll as well. You must do this after you roll, but before you know the result.
